text: Toto Abamalaika baliboolela balia ababafwisinjia abakholela obubii emioyo chiabu, mbu: “Mwali murie?” nabo baliboola mbu:, “khwali kwasilwa khushialo.” Baliboolelwa; “eshialo shia Nyasaye sishiali nobwiyangu bwokhuwuya tawe?” Kho abo eshimenyo shiabu ni mumulilo (Jahanam, ) nako ni amakalushilo amabii muno
